      • startPublish

        public void startPublish(java.lang.String rtmpUrl)
        When invoked will start the process of streaming
        Parameters:
        rtmpUrl - - the url of endpoint

      • stopPublish

        public void stopPublish()
        When invoked will stop the streaming process

      • switchCamera

        public void switchCamera()
        When invoked will switch the camera. First it will check which camera is used, and it will switch the camera based on that.

      • setCameraFacing

        public void setCameraFacing(int id)
        Set the camera by id.

      • isMute

        public boolean isMute()
        Check if the publisher is currently set on mute.

      • setMute

        public void setMute()
        When invoked will set the encoder to send only video, with no audio. First will check if the mute option is already on, and will operate based on that.

      • startRecord

        public boolean startRecord(java.lang.String recordingPath)
        When invoked it will start the local recording/saving of the video
        Parameters:
        recordingPath - - the path where to save the video

      • stopRecord

        public void stopRecord()
        When invoked it will stop the last initiated recording.

      • pauseRecord

        public void pauseRecord()
        When invoked it will pause the recording of the video.

      • resumeRecord

        public void resumeRecord()
        When invoked it will resume the recording of the video, if the pauseRecord()

      • switchToSoftEncoder

        public void switchToSoftEncoder()
        When invoked will switch the encoder to software encoding.

        When invoked will switch the encoder to hardware encoding.

      • setVideoOutputResolution

        public void setVideoOutputResolution(int width,
                                     int height,
                                     int orientation)
        Set the video output resolution. Keep in mind that we only support 16:9 aspect ratio resolutions!
        Parameters:
        width - - the width
        height - - the height
        orientation - - the current orientation

        When invoked sets a new bitrate.
        Parameters:
        bitRate - - bitrate value - Example : 20000

      • getFramerate

        public int getFramerate()
        Get current framerate.

      • setFramerate

        public boolean setFramerate(int framerate)
        Set the streaming and recording framerate.
        Parameters:
        framerate - - framerate value - Example : 10, 15, 30, 60

      • getKeyframeInterval

        public int getKeyframeInterval()
        Get current keyframe interval.

      • setKeyframeInterval

        public void setKeyframeInterval(int keyframeInterval)
        Set the streaming keyframe interval. A negative value means no key frames are requested after the first frame. A zero value means a stream containing all key frames is requested.
        Parameters:
        keyframeInterval - - keyframeInterval value in seconds

      • setScreenOrientation

        public void setScreenOrientation(int orientation)
        Sets the orientation of the video output.
        Parameters:
        orientation - - the new screen configuration

      • getSupportedPictureSizes

        Get the list of supported streaming resolutions for the current camera.

        Check if it is using the audio soft encoder.
